wikipedia_page.main: Adam Charles Gross (born 16 February 1986) is an English footballer. He played a handful of games for Wales at youth level. He has also represented England on a number of occasions, turning out for the National Game XI. He plays as a left-back for Thurrock.

response: * Adam Gross – architect, Ayers Saint Gross
